data.prayer: Father, help your children in East End, Cayman Islands find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of East End, Cayman Islands
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of East End, Cayman Islands.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of East End to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in East End. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of East End
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of East End, East End, Cayman Islands.
Spirit, guide the 339 believers in the state of East End into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 339 believers in the state of East End the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary:
the state of East End, Cayman Islands has a population of 1,600.

We estimate East End has 339 people who might know Jesus, 971 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 290 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 339 believers living in the state of East End. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.
